actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of capital gains and losses.

summary.text: Redefines, for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code, the terms "long-term capital gain" and "long-term capital loss" to apply to capital assets held for more than 90 days (formerly 6 months). Sets forth the calculatable amount of carryover allowed by a taxpayer (other than a corporation) on a new capital loss and details the rules governing carrybacks for such taxpayers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of capital gains and losses.
